channel.title: Crip Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: We are set to make a difference in the tech industry
channel.itunes:author: Johnie Hjelm & Viktor Johansson
channel.itunes:summary: A podcast from Johnie Hjelm and Viktor Johansson on all the things about digital media, design, testing, personal development and more…
channel.description: A podcast from Johnie Hjelm and Viktor Johansson, two crips conquering the world with testing, design, development and leadership.

item.title: Episode 10 - Recap
item.itunes:author: Johnie Hjelm & Viktor Johansson
item.itunes:subtitle: Crip Podcast: Episode 10 - Recap
item.itunes:summary: It has been pretty quiet from our side in the last 5 months. But the earth is still spinning and we're moving at a pace so fast we're wondering how we got here in one piece. In this recap podcast, we’re just going over what has happened in our lives...

item.title: Episode 9 - Adam Wessman Ek
item.itunes:author: Johnie Hjelm & Viktor Johansson
item.itunes:subtitle: Crip Podcast: Episode 9 - Adam Wessman Ek
item.itunes:summary: Today we're interviewing Adam Wessman Ek. A young crip who always try to challenge the status quo with his awesome company Viz Studio. Adam is an Art Director and he's able to create great stuff in 3D and print. In this podcast, which we believe is our most relaxed one...

item.title: Episode 8 - Jay Martinez
item.itunes:author: Johnie Hjelm & Viktor Johansson
item.itunes:subtitle: Crip Podcast: Episode 8 - Jay Martinez
item.itunes:summary: Wherever you are in life it's more likely that you're probably going through something in your life it could be work, family, or just with yourself and maybe even your pass The funny thing is we always think the problems will last forever but they never do! My name is...

item.title: Episode 7 - Stefan Melin Rydfalk
item.itunes:author: Johnie Hjelm & Viktor Johansson
item.itunes:subtitle: Crip Podcast: Episode 7 - Stefan Melin Rydfalk
item.itunes:summary: Today we had the pleasure of interviewing Viktors partner in crime Stefan Melin Rydfalk. A contruction worker in Stockholm with leader potential. We talked about (roughly in order): 00:30 Who is Stefan? 07:32 What does he define painful? 19:43 What does he love? 24:50 What does he wish? 28:05 Does...

item.title: Episode 6 - Happy Now
item.itunes:author: Johnie Hjelm & Viktor Johansson
item.itunes:subtitle: Crip Podcast: Episode 6 - Happy Now
item.itunes:summary: Viktor and I decided to go solo sometimes in our podcasts, due to issue that we only can participate together once a week. In this narrating podcast I would like to talk about how we celebrate the new year to come, but never the present. I believe it’s important that...

item.title: Episode 5 - David Lega
item.itunes:author: Johnie Hjelm & Viktor Johansson
item.itunes:subtitle: Crip Podcast: Episode 5 - David Lega
item.itunes:summary: Before we can build the world we want to live in, we have to imagine it. Greatness starts with a clear vision of the future. So now that Viktor is home from New York over christmas, we actually got the opportunity to interview a person aspired to positively change the...

item.title: Episode 4 - Geordie Keitt
item.itunes:author: Johnie Hjelm & Viktor Johansson
item.itunes:subtitle: Crip Podcast: Episode 4 - Geordie Keitt
item.itunes:summary: In todays podcast we’re going to interview a highly passioned Software tester. He’s context driven and always hungry to learn more. The guy we're talking about is of course Geordie Keitt. Geordie is a truly inspirational person that deliver the product feedback developers, project leads, and business deciders need by...

item.title: Episode 3 - Connectivity
item.itunes:author: Johnie Hjelm & Viktor Johansson
item.itunes:subtitle: Crip Podcast: Episode 3 - Connectivity
item.itunes:summary: We have finally come to our third episode, and we’re just getting started! We’ve been getting a lot of comments, feedback and peptalks about our podcast, and that really pushes us forward to make this even greater. So if you have anything to say – maybe our posts and podcasts...

item.title: Episode 2 - Marissa Monera
item.itunes:author: Johnie Hjelm & Viktor Johansson
item.itunes:subtitle: Crip Podcast: Episode 2 - Marissa Monera
item.itunes:summary: This week we’re joined by Marissa Monera. Marissa is a technical writer at Viacom in New York. She started out as a software developer, but after maternity leave she found it hard to get a job in a fast growing community. So she found a job as a technical writer,...

item.title: Episode 1 - Pilot
item.itunes:author: Johnie Hjelm & Viktor Johansson
item.itunes:subtitle: Crip Podcast: Episode 1 - Pilot
item.itunes:summary: We have the pleasure to announce that we are publishing our first podast! Our goal is to talk about all things digital media, design, testing, personal development, entrepreneurship and more… We also plan to interview some recognized people in our community, but if you know someone specific - don’t hesitate...
